thread.title: A look at Elle Macpherson's luxurious $20 million mansion | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: A look at Elle Macpherson's luxurious $20 million mansion | Daily Mail Online

author: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
title: A look at Elle Macpherson's luxurious $20 million mansion | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 101 shares The Mediterranean style estate is located near a sprawling golf course while a perimeter of trees and shrubs offer privacy. Meanwhile, a dock sits just metres from their front gate for when the wealthy couple wants to explore the neighbourhood by boat. Living the dream! The Mediterranean style estate is located near a sprawling golf course, while a perimeter of trees and shrubs offer privacy. A dock sits just metres from their front gate for when the wealthy couple wants to explore the neighbourhood by boat Second owner! While Elle calls the estate her home, it was actually custom built for her husband Jeffrey Soffer's (pictured) first wife Kimberly, who he later divorced While Elle calls the estate her home, it was actually custom built for her husband's first wife Kimberly, who he later divorced. The property is now worth four times what Jeffrey paid for it back in 2000. Elle married the US businessman in July 2013 at the Laucala Resort in Fiji and later relocated from London to Miami to live with him. Afternoon at the mansion: Elle posted a sunset photo to Instagram that appears to have been taken at her Miami home Perfect! The supermodel, nicknamed 'The Body', also took a photo from an upper level of her home while looking out over the pool in the front yard But the lingerie entrepreneur says that not everyone understood her decision to 'uproot' her life for her husband. 'People are surprised that I moved my whole family from London to Miami for love,' she told Porter magazine last year. The models' children join her at the home, but they also spend time with their father, London-based French financier Arpad Busson. Elle was in a relationship with Arpad from 1995 until 2005, becoming engaged in 2003. They share two sons, Arpad Flynn, 18, and Aurelius Andrea, 14. Family home! Elle's younger son has been recently pictured in what appears to be the backyard of her Malibu property Share or comment on this article 101
